content: We need more information. What do you mean by 'locked out'? Did thunderbird install? is it asking for a password? If there are any messages, please post full text of the message. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: Het wachtwoord waar om wordt gevraagd zal het wachtwoord zijn van uw e-mailaccount. Dit is niet een hoofdwachtwoord voor toegang tot Thunderbird, daar is nooit een wachtwoord voor nodig. Wel kunt u de wachtwoordgegevens beveiligen met een hoofdwachtwoord als uitgelegd in https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/thunderbird-wachtwoorden-beschermen-hoofdwachtwoord. Dit voorkomt echter niet de toegang tot al gedownloade e-mailberichten.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
Thunderbird non richiede nome utente e password per essere avviato. Al massimo può richiedere la Password principale se questa funzione è stata attivata (ma non credo sia il tuo caso) -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/password-principale-thunderbird

Se ti riferisci a nome utente e password del tuo account di posta: - si possono recuperare se hai ancora accesso alla vecchia installazione di Thunderbird - altrimenti devi chiedere al tuo fornitore/gestore della casella email
creator: @next

content: What a bummer! Thanks for your intent to donate; that, in itself, sets you apart from the masses. This is the support forum and, being volunteers, we cannot assist in this. BUT, you can contact the donation folks at https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/donate/help/ and appeal to them to change their requirements. Thank you for sharing this.
creator: davidsk

content: I am NOT the super tekkie on this forum. BUT, I experiment and survive. :) The important addressbooks are abook.sqlite and history.sqlite. From my experience, you can delete all the others (when thunderbird is not running) and the appropriate ones will be recreated when you restart thunderbird. That's been my experience and I just did it prior to writing this response. Also, if you still have abook.mab or history.mab, they are old and can be deleted
creator: davidsk
